title: Step Configuration
description: Basic step configuration with type, name, path, method, and workflow flows.

title: Request Body Validation
description: Manual validation for pet data including name, species, and age.

title: Pet Object Creation
description: Creates pet object with validated data, generates unique ID, and stores in JavaScript store.

title: Workflow Trigger
description: Emits 'js.pet.created' and 'js.feeding.reminder.enqueued' events to trigger background jobs.

title: Success Response
description: Returns stream result with pet creation details.

title: Logging
description: Structured logging for monitoring and debugging with contextual data.
